description: At least 59 people were killed, and 527 were injured in a mass shooting during an open-air music festival in Las Vegas, near the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino on Sunday night.
text:
Deadliest US shooting: 58 killed, and 527 injured at Las Vegas music fest
At least 59 people were killed, and 527 were injured in a mass shooting during an open-air music festival in Las Vegas, near the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino on Sunday night.
title: Deadliest US shooting: 58 killed, and 527 injured at Las Vegas music fest
